**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 20 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 18 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 15 [Mercenary Sailor](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1552) **Source** [Pathfinder #147: Tomorrow Must Burn](/Sources.aspx?ID=8) pg. 18 **Perception** +11 **Languages** [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1) **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +11, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +13, [Sailing Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +13, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +11, [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) +11 **Str** +4 **Dex** +4 **Con** +3 **Int** +0 **Wis** +2 **Cha** -1 **Items** [Leather Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=4), [Scimitar](/Weapons.aspx?ID=38), [Shortbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=77) (20 arrows) --- **AC** 22 **Fort** +12 **Ref** +15 **Will** +9 **HP** 75 **Shipboard Grace** The mercenary sailor is not [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16)
while [Balancing](/Actions.aspx?ID=28) or [Climbing](/Actions.aspx?ID=33) while on a watercraft. --- **Speed** 25 feet **Melee** scimitar +15 ([Forceful](/Traits.aspx?ID=180), [Sweep](/Traits.aspx?ID=194)), **Damage** 1d6+7 slashing **Ranged** shortbow +15 ([deadly 1d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [range increment 60 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 0](/Traits.aspx?ID=254)), **Damage** 1d6+3 piercing **Mobility** When the sailor takes a Stride action to move half their Speed or less, that movement does not trigger reactions. **Shipboard Savvy** The sailor's melee Strikes deal 2d6 extra precision damage if both the sailor and the target are on watercraft.
